title: How are immigrant indian men able to marry non indian women at high rates in US in spite of having creepy image ?
selftext:
I was checking the interracial marriage rates of different communities in US and it is only indian immigrant men who have such high out marry rates (twice as high as immigrant women). Just wanted to ask even though most abcd men here feel their dating image is ruined by immigrants and abcd women don't marry immigrant men but they themselves do pretty fine it seems by the data. Why do abcds think the data says so?

For immigrant men it's 20% outmarry rate while for immigrant women it's 10%

[https://twitter.com/Noahpinion/status/986761107602681857](https://twitter.com/Noahpinion/status/986761107602681857)

scroll up this tweet to see the difference between us born and total to see the difference in choosing white partners.

[https://carnegieendowment.org/2021/06/09/social-realities-of-indian-americans-results-from-2020-indian-american-attitudes-survey-pub-84667](https://carnegieendowment.org/2021/06/09/social-realities-of-indian-americans-results-from-2020-indian-american-attitudes-survey-pub-84667)

just skim through the rest of the data points
